attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the British public would welcome the Prime Minister honoring Bruce Forsyth with a knighthood. He has been a mainstay of British entertainment for many years and has raised many thousands of pounds for charity. In his 80th birthday year it would be a fitting tribute to a very popular man and I'm sure would be welcomed by the public.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Knightbrucie/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
